mapper.select: SELECT u.challenge_id, c.title, c.image, u.start_date FROM challenges AS c INNER JOIN user_challenges AS u ON c.challenge_id = u.challenge_id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND u.diary_bool = 0

SELECT c.challenge_id, c.category, c.title, c.image, u.diary_bool, u.start_date, u.end_date FROM challenges AS c LEFT JOIN user_challenges AS u ON c.challenge_id = u.challenge_id AND u.user_id = #{userId}
